context.p: The workspace properties can be edited by completing the following procedure:

step.cmd: With My Workspace open, click Properties.
step.info: When you open the Properties editor for a workspace from the toolbar as opposed to the pop-up menu, the properties for the workspace display.

step.cmd: Clear Assign as default for this Navigator Item.
Test the new setting by opening another workspace, then clicking this Navigator item again.
step.info: My Workspace does not display. Instead, you see the original undefined workspace, which is the default workspace for this Navigator item.

step.cmd: To open My Workspace, right-click the Navigator item, click Workspace, and select My Workspace from the list.
